response.overview: 5 years ago because of modeling school girls between the jealousy triggered by a prank, directly leading to one of the girls collapse disfigurement suicide, but was found in time, the life is saved, but the face is ruined, not only the face is ruined, but also ruined their best five years of youth, the same orphan brother, in order to restore his sister's self-confidence, sold his house to give his sister cosmetic surgery, until one day, the brother in the magazine to see the former The mastermind of the school prank is now enjoying the splendor of life, the brother angry, decided to take revenge, so he planned and organized a trip to shoot the event, the former participants of the prank were invited over, taking advantage of the typhoon, communication and transportation is not convenient, the two siblings to implement the vengeance plan, and finally the same death!
response.title: Bikini Murders
